languages.text: {n}Заметно трепеща, Клеменциа сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость... или, как зовут вас ваши подданные, Великий Светоч. Я хотела бы лично доложить, что любовь ваших подданных превосходит все ожидания, какие могли быть даже у персоны вашего положения. В вашу честь возводятся часовни, ваше имя произносят с трепетом... и к вам же направляют молитвы, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Заметно трепеща, Клеменциа сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость... или, как зовут вас ваши подданные, Великий Светоч. Я хотела бы лично доложить, что любовь ваших подданных превосходит все ожидания, какие могли быть даже у персоны вашего положения. В вашу честь возводятся часовни, ваше имя произносят с трепетом... и к вам же направляют молитвы, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia offers you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I only wished to report to you personally that your people's devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build chapels in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметно трепеща, Клеменциа сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость... или, как зовут вас ваши подданные, Великий Светоч. Я хотела бы лично доложить, что любовь ваших подданных превосходит все ожидания, какие могли быть даже у персоны вашего положения. В вашу честь возводятся часовни, ваше имя произносят с трепетом... и к вам же направляют молитвы, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}With obvious trepidation Clementia bends in a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that love of your subjects is beyond any expectations even for a person in your position. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

{n}With obvious trepidation Clementia bends in a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that love of your subjects is beyond any expectations even for a person in your position. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

{n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia gives you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Exalted Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that your subjects' devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

{n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia gives you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Exalted Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that your subjects' devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

{n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia offers you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I only wished to report to you personally that your people's devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build chapels in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅看起来显然很惊恐，向你深鞠一躬。{/n}“欢迎回来，大人……或者，我应该像您的臣民那样称呼您，至高明光。我期望亲自向您报告，即便是对您这样的大人物而言，您的臣民对您的虔诚也超出了所有人的想象。他们为您建造礼拜堂，敬畏地称呼您的名字……甚至向您祈祷，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia offers you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I only wished to report to you personally that your people's devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build chapels in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅看起来显然很惊恐，向你深鞠一躬。{/n}“欢迎回来，大人……或者，我应该像您的臣民那样称呼您，至高明光。我期望亲自向您报告，即便是对您这样的大人物而言，您的臣民对您的虔诚也超出了所有人的想象。他们为您建造礼拜堂，敬畏地称呼您的名字……甚至向您祈祷，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Visiblement inquiète, Clémentia s'incline devant vous.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, Votre Seigneurie... ou plutôt, "Guide {mf|exalté|exaltée}", comme vous appellent vos sujets. Je souhaitais vous faire savoir personnellement que la dévotion de vos sujets surpasse toutes les attentes, même pour une personne de votre statut. Ils bâtissent des églises en votre honneur, prononcent votre nom avec adoration... et vous adressent même leurs prières, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia gives you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Exalted Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that your subjects' devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement inquiète, Clémentia s'incline devant vous.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, Votre Seigneurie... ou plutôt, "Guide {mf|exalté|exaltée}", comme vous appellent vos sujets. Je souhaitais vous faire savoir personnellement que la dévotion de vos sujets surpasse toutes les attentes, même pour une personne de votre statut. Ils bâtissent des églises en votre honneur, prononcent votre nom avec adoration... et vous adressent même leurs prières, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}明らかに震えながら、クレメンティアは深々と礼をする。{/n}「おかえりなさいませ、陛下…もとい、あなたの臣下がお呼びになるところでは、エグザルテッド・ビーコン陛下。臣下たちの献身は、たとえあなたのような御身分の方に対してのものであったとしても、全て期待を上回るものだったことをご報告したくまいったのです。彼らはあなたを称える教会を建立し、畏怖を以てあなたの名をお呼びし…さらにあなたへの祈りを捧げております、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia offers you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I only wished to report to you personally that your people's devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build chapels in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}明らかに震えながら、クレメンティアは深々と礼をする。{/n}「おかえりなさいませ、陛下…もとい、あなたの臣下がお呼びになるところでは、エグザルテッド・ビーコン陛下。臣下たちの献身は、たとえあなたのような御身分の方に対してのものであったとしても、全て期待を上回るものだったことをご報告したくまいったのです。彼らはあなたを称える教会を建立し、畏怖を以てあなたの名をお呼びし…さらにあなたへの祈りを捧げております、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}Con tensión palpable, Clementia te ofrece una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Bienvenid{mf|o|a}, mi{mf|lord|lady}... o, como le llaman sus súbditos, Gran Faro. Solo quería informarle personalmente de que la devoción de su pueblo supera todas las expectativas, incluso para alguien de su calado. Construyen capillas en su honor, pronuncian su nombre con admiración... y hasta le dirigen sus plegarias, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia offers you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Great Beacon. I only wished to report to you personally that your people's devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build chapels in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con tensión palpable, Clementia te ofrece una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Bienvenid{mf|o|a}, mi{mf|lord|lady}... o, como le llaman sus súbditos, Gran Faro. Solo quería informarle personalmente de que la devoción de su pueblo supera todas las expectativas, incluso para alguien de su calado. Construyen capillas en su honor, pronuncian su nombre con admiración... y hasta le dirigen sus plegarias, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}Clementia wirkt ängstlich, als sie sich tief vor dir verneigt.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... oder wie Eure Untertanen Euch nennen, Erhabenes Licht. Ich wollte Euch persönlich berichten, dass die Hingabe Eurer Untertanen sämtliche Erwartungen übertrifft, selbst für eine Person von Eurem Status. Sie bauen Kirchen zu Ehren, sprechen Euren Namen voller Ehrfurcht aus ... und richten sogar ihre Gebete an Euch, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}With obvious trepidation, Clementia gives you a low bow.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... or, as your subjects refer to you, Exalted Beacon. I wanted to report to you personally that your subjects' devotion surpasses all expectations, even for a person of your stature. They build churches in your honour, speak your name with awe... and even address their prayers to you, Lord Captain."
